name: Chicken Quest (ltc0522)
description:
Demo Gameplay

1. Player Control

Player can use W/S/A/D for forward/back/left/right movements, Left Mouse Button to attack by swinging weapons, and Space for Jump. When player do a specific action(e.g. Click on button, swing a weapon), a corresponding sound effect will be played.

2.Talking to NPC

Player can press “F” to talk to the NPC, and use mouse to select options from the dialogue to trigger the quest.

3. Battle

Player can use the left mouse button to swing the weapon to attack. When the weapon hits the enemy will cause the enemy to decrease health, and eventually dies. The enemy will also try to move forward and attack the player. Player will receive a score when they defeat an enemy. There are 2 types of enemies which have different animations and statuses.

Player will face 2 waves of enemies in the quest, clearing all the enemies will unlock the next wave. 

When all waves are cleared, the quest will be completed.

4. Switch Weapon

By pressing “Q” or “E”, player is able to switch between different weapons, each weapon will have its own swinging speed and damage. The player can choose the weapon they like.

5. Game Ending

The game ends in 2 ways: player dies or the mission is completed.

Both will give the option to go back to the main menu
